pages.text: $(#db0000)$(bold)Fire dragons$() can spawn in the following biomes:$(br2)Desert$(br)Desert Hills$(br)Birch Forest$(br)Birch Forest Hills$(br)Desert Lakes$(br)Dark Forest$(br)Dark Forest Hills$(br)Cherry Blossom Grove$(br)Golden Prairie$(br)Lavender Forest
Lavender Field$(br)Dunes$(br)Red Desert$(br)Lush Red Desert$(br)Red Desert Dunes$(br)Sierra Valley$(br)Mojave Desert$(br)Red Rock Mountains$(br)Wooded Red Rock Mountains$(br)Red Rock Highlands
